name: Citadale
description: Citadale - Gate of Souls is a 2D Action game. You follow Sonja Dorleac as she Infiltrates a dark fortress and fights her way through the hordes of the undead. Utilize the Wii U™ GamePad and TV in different ways to view the entire map while you play. With Miiverse™ integration, you can obtain stamps as you progress through the levels and challenges.
